verses.name: Romans 2:10
verses.text: But glory, honour, and peace, to every man that worketh good, to the Jew first, and also to the Gentile:

verses.name: Romans 2:11
verses.text: For there is no respect of persons with God.

verses.name: Romans 2:12
verses.text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law: and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law;

verses.name: Romans 2:13
verses.text: (For not the hearers of the law are just before God, but the doers of the law shall be justified.
